"Self-Destruction":
"Oh, dude, have you seen those super deranged
automata?! You know which ones I'm talking about?
I think they're called Sparziles or something like that.
I thought they were some busted up old relics, when
they suddenly started coming up to me and self-
destructing! What the heck, dude? But lucky it was me
'cause I can handle stuff like that with a cool head.
How about you go see what they're all about, too?

*Target: Hostiles level 21or higher"

"おいおい、見たか、知ってるか？
アッタマおかしい機甲種がいるぜ！
確か、スパルザイルとかいうヤツだよ！
なんか壊れかけのザコだと思ったら
まとわりついてきて自爆してきやがる！
マジおっかねえって！
まあ、オレぐらいになるとそーいう事態にも
冷静に的確に対処できるんだけどな。
おたくも一度、倒してきたらどうよ？
※Lv.21～のエネミーが対象"
